name: Judgment of the Branded
text: Target 1 Level 8 or higher Fusion Monster you control; destroy all monsters your opponent controls with an equal or higher ATK than that monster. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY because it was sent there this turn to activate the effect of "Fallen of Albaz": You can Set this card. You can only use this effect of "Judgment of Stigmatika" once per turn.
